document.full_text: an appeals court on tuesday denied a bid for bail by a former goldman sachs group inc programer sentenced to eight years in prison for stealing part of the bank's high-frequency trading code.
document.title: ex-goldman programmer denied bail bid on appeal
lines_and_colors: an appeals court on tuesday denied a bid for bail by a former goldman sachs group inc programer sentenced to eight years in prison for stealing part of the bank's high-frequency trading code.
